name: Wild Animals Rescuer 3D
description:
Have you ever dreamed of rescuing animals? Do you find yourself watching for creatures wishing you could help? Wild Animals Rescuer offers the next best thing. Set in a forest, it lets you control a character with various resources at his disposal. Foxes, deer, bison, and bears are sick.

Help them before it’s too late. In this forest you’ll find random apples, flowers, bones, etc. Cheese, fish, eggs, and bread also in your inventory can be used to devise magic, animal-curing potions. However, there’s one caveat… You are not alone. Hungry wolves are lurking. They’re doing quite well… strong… ready to attack.

Run for your life! The right-side map shows where the animals are. On the top left is your health meter. Control your direction with the arrows on the bottom left. Here’s where your potion levels are too. Be safe in this 3D animated world where you’re the rescuer of wild animals.

Key features:

- awesome 3d graphics
- lot of animals - bears, foxes, deers, wolfs, bisons
- craft potions - 12 items to collect and use
- open world
